[vc_row equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” enable_content_animation=”yes” ca_init_scale_x=”1″ ca_init_scale_y=”1″ ca_init_scale_z=”1″ ca_init_opacity=”1″ ca_an_scale_x=”1″ ca_an_scale_y=”1″ ca_an_scale_z=”1″ ca_an_opacity=”1″ bg_position=”center center” css=”.vc_custom_1601388403628{padding-top: 200px !important;padding-bottom: 300px !important;background-image: url(https://falanxcyber.com/wp-content/uploads/Ethical-Phishing.jpg?id=11115) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” ca_init_translate_x=”1″ ca_init_translate_y=”-53″ ca_delay=”300″ row_hide=”hidden-xs”][vc_column width=”1/2″ responsive_css=”padding_right_large:0px|padding_right_medium:0px|padding_right_small:20px”]

Ethical Phishing

Are your staff prepared for cyber attacks that are designed to coax sensitive information from them? Let us find out.

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ align=”text-center”] Get in touch [vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” enable_content_animation=”yes” ca_init_scale_x=”1″ ca_init_scale_y=”1″ ca_init_scale_z=”1″ ca_init_opacity=”1″ ca_an_scale_x=”1″ ca_an_scale_y=”1″ ca_an_scale_z=”1″ ca_an_opacity=”1″ bg_position=”right center” css=”.vc_custom_1597402800989{padding-top: 90px !important;padding-bottom: 270px !important;background-image: url(https://falanxcyber.com/wp-content/uploads/Ethical-Phishing-1.jpg?id=11116) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” ca_init_translate_x=”1″ ca_init_translate_y=”-53″ ca_delay=”300″ row_hide=”hidden-sm hidden-md hidden-lg”][vc_column width=”1/2″]

Ethical
Phishing

Are your staff prepared for
cyber attacks that are designed
to coax sensitive information
from them? Let us find out.

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ align=”text-center”] Get in touch [vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row gap=”0″ bg_position=”right top” css=”.vc_custom_1588849858825{background-image: url(https://falanxcyber.com/wp-content/uploads/yellow-middle-section.jpg?id=8868) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column enable_content_animation=”yes” animation_preset=”Fade In Left” css=”.vc_custom_1600433076585{margin-top: -230px !important;padding-top: 40px !important;padding-right: 10px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;padding-left: 10px !important;background-color: #f7f7f7 !important;}” ca_delay=”260″ ca_duration=”3000″ responsive_css=”margin_top_large:-230px|padding_top_large:60px|padding_right_large:50px|padding_bottom_large:60px|padding_left_large:50px|margin_top_medium:-230px|padding_top_medium:60px|padding_right_medium:30px|padding_bottom_medium:60px|padding_left_medium:30px|margin_top_small:-230px|padding_top_small:60px|padding_right_small:30px|padding_bottom_small:60px|padding_left_small:30px”]

Why use our ethical phishing services?

[vc_row_inner gap=”25″ css=”.vc_custom_1595431128178{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-right: 60px !important;padding-left: 60px !important;}” el_class=”square-icons” responsive_css=”padding_top_large:50px|padding_right_large:60px|padding_left_large:60px|padding_top_small:50px|padding_right_small:0px|padding_left_small:0px”][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ offset=”vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-4 vc_col-xs-12″]

To test your organisation’s defences.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ offset=”vc_col-lg-offset-0 vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-4 vc_col-xs-12″]

To identify potential data leaks.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1600433029046{margin-right: -20px !important;margin-left: -20px !important;}” offset=”vc_col-lg-offset-0 vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-offset-0 vc_col-md-4 vc_col-xs-12″]

To highlight weaknesses in human behaviour.

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text]

Phishing is more prevalent than ever and becoming increasingly more sophisticated. We can help you minimise cyber attacks and identify cyber weaknesses in your organisation through the education and safe testing of your employees through our ethical phishing solutions.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_placement=”middle” enable_content_animation=”yes” ca_init_scale_x=”1″ ca_init_scale_y=”1″ ca_init_scale_z=”1″ ca_init_opacity=”1″ ca_an_scale_x=”1″ ca_an_scale_y=”1″ ca_an_scale_z=”1″ ca_an_opacity=”1″ bg_position=”center center” css=”.vc_custom_1600858639953{padding-top: 90px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;background-image: url(https://falanxcyber.com/wp-content/uploads/Ethical-Phishing-2.jpg?id=11117) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” ca_duration=”1600″ ca_delay=”160″ ca_init_translate_y=”31″ el_id=”detect-information-section” responsive_css=”padding_top_large:90px|padding_bottom_large:70px”][vc_column enable_content_animation=”yes” ca_init_scale_x=”1″ ca_init_scale_y=”1″ ca_init_scale_z=”1″ ca_init_opacity=”1″ ca_an_scale_x=”1″ ca_an_scale_y=”1″ ca_an_scale_z=”1″ ca_an_opacity=”1″ align=”text-center” offset=”vc_col-md-offset-0 vc_col-md-6 vc_hidden-xs” ca_duration=”1600″ ca_delay=”160″ ca_init_translate_y=”31″][/vc_column][vc_column enable_content_animation=”yes” ca_init_scale_x=”1″ ca_init_scale_y=”1″ ca_init_scale_z=”1″ ca_init_opacity=”0″ ca_an_scale_x=”1″ ca_an_scale_y=”1″ ca_an_scale_z=”1″ ca_an_opacity=”1″ offset=”vc_col-lg-offset-0 vc_col-md-offset-6 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″ responsive_css=”margin_left_large:15%25|padding_left_large:7%25|margin_left_medium:15%25|padding_right_medium:7%25|padding_left_medium:7%25″ ca_duration=”1600″ ca_delay=”160″ ca_init_translate_y=”30″ css=”.vc_custom_1600433156945{padding-top: 3% !important;padding-right: 3% !important;padding-bottom: 3% !important;padding-left: 3% !important;background-color: rgba(255,255,255,0.82) !important;*background-color: rgb(255,255,255) !important;}”]

What is phishing?

[vc_column_text]Phishing is basically ‘fishing’ for sensitive information. This could be anything from usernames, passwords, bank details, and other personal details. Cyber criminals use ‘bait’, such as a spoof email that looks official, to catch their victims.

Our Ethical Phishing services thoroughly assess the ability of your organisation’s personnel to identify and appropriately act to targeted email phishing attacks. By utilising the tactics, techniques and procedures used by genuine attackers, our range of phishing services can be run as stand-alone exercises, or in conjunction with each other over a period of time, as part of a tailored campaign.

We can even bring your cybersecurity awareness training for employees to life by conducting the ethical phishing service and using the results to tailor your staff’s training programme. This way, their training is conducted with real-world examples that involve them, making the lesson much more memorable.[/vc_column_text]

Did you know that an email that seems trustworthy could be a phishing attempt designed to steal information? We can help you identify them.

Find out more
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row equal_height=”yes” bg_position=”center bottom” css=”.vc_custom_1600858604460{padding-top: 15px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;background-image: url(https://falanxcyber.com/wp-content/uploads/slash-background-for-box-buttons-2.jpg?id=9304) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” responsive_css=”padding_top_large:75px|padding_bottom_large:75px”][vc_column width=”2/3″ enable_content_animation=”yes” ca_init_scale_x=”1″ ca_init_scale_y=”1″ ca_init_scale_z=”1″ ca_init_opacity=”0″ ca_an_scale_x=”1″ ca_an_scale_y=”1″ ca_an_scale_z=”1″ ca_an_opacity=”1″ align=”text-center” offset=”vc_col-sm-offset-2″ ca_init_translate_y=”50″][vc_empty_space height=”60px” el_class=”mobile-hidden”]

Ethical phishing services we offer

[vc_empty_space height=”20px”][/vc_column][vc_column responsive_align=”text-xs-left”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″ offset=”vc_hidden-xs”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”2/3″ responsive_align=”text-sm-left text-xs-left” offset=”vc_col-md-8 vc_col-xs-12″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1600425510040{padding-right: 20px !important;padding-left: 20px !important;}” el_class=”mobile-left”]

Every phishing campaign that we conduct for you concludes with a detailed report of your employee’s susceptibility to certain attacks, complete with actionable recommendations to further improve their abilities and knowledge.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″ offset=”vc_hidden-xs”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”60px”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ el_class=”ipad-full-width”]

Credential harvesting and pharming

We will coax your organisation’s employees into disclosing their credentials. This service is ideal for assessing your employee’s awareness of phishing email attacks. Furthermore, all credentials obtained can then be reviewed to ensure they adhere to an adequate password policy

Whaling

Akin to Spear Phishing, the target(s) will be at the senior executive level within your organisation. Again, the aim of this test is to gauge the susceptibility of the target(s) to reveal confidential information.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1601907736232{margin-top: 0px !important;}” responsive_css=”margin_top_large:100px|margin_top_medium:100px|margin_top_small:0px” el_class=”ipad-full-width”]

Spear phishing

This uses phishing scenarios previously mentioned but the attack is directed at a specific target group of individuals (e.g. your finance department) using information specific to the target(s). This test allows you to gauge the likelihood of the targets revealing confidential information.

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]

"I need a trusted partner that can provide additional security services into my portfolio."

Managing Director

Enhance your portfolio with our suite of cybersecurity services Find out more

“As a security manager I know the benefit of carrying out simulated cyber attacks on our systems. I need a service provider that can handle my requirements.”

Security Manager

Uncover critical vulnerabilities in your environment Find out more

“I need a supplier that understands the importance of implementing and maintaining Information Security best practices critical to our ongoing success and reputation.”

Managing Director

Get real-time ongoing cyber detection & response Find out more

“My job is to ensure that our business is protected against cyber security attacks. I need a company that can hunt for and eradicate threats.”

CISO

24/7 ongoing monitoring to hunt for and eradicate threats Find out more

“I need a company that can deliver cutting-edge training to my staff, ensuring they are empowered to recognise and defend against cyber security threats.”

Head of Training

Training and advisory services to empower your staff Find out more [/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row parallax=”enable_parallax” enable_content_animation=”yes” animation_preset=”Fade In Right” enable_overlay=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1601388414660{padding-top: 100px !important;padding-bottom: 140px !important;background-image: url(https://falanxcyber.com/wp-content/uploads/Testimonials-V2.jpg?id=12953) !important;background-position: center;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” ca_duration=”1600″ ca_delay=”160″ el_id=”testimonials-pen-test” row_hide=”hidden-xs”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-md-4″]

Testimonials

[/vc_column][vc_column offset=”vc_col-md-offset-3 vc_col-md-9″]

“I have been very impressed by the high standard of Falanx’s communication, testing procedures and reporting. From the initial engagement through to test reports and follow up advice, they have provided exceptional service and I wouldn’t hesitate to recommend them; we will certainly be using them again for future testing.”

Claudia Zimmer
Operations Manager, Ensign Pensions

“The team at Falanx have been great, from an initial enquiry to completing the test has been seamless. Our account manager and the rest of the team have been incredibly reactive in responding to our queries and the work performed has been great. I would not hesitate to recommend Falanx for your IT Security needs.”

Mitchell Smith
Product Manager, One Site Global Ltd

“We have worked with Falanx Cyber for several years and have always been impressed with the professional service they provide. This begins with the early stages of planning, providing useful advice on which areas to focus testing on, including any specific details around emerging threats. This continues with the execution of the agreed pen tests and vulnerability assessments where we are kept informed throughout the whole process, and finally with the informative reports produced and any assistance required following any remediation efforts.”

James Myhill
Head of IT, Canal and River Trust

“Falanx provided us with a phishing campaign that delivered a invaluable insight into how our staff reacted to potentially dangerous phishing attempts. The Phishing results were very  enlightening and will help shape our internal cyber security awareness program. We were very pleased with the design and execution of the campaign and we will continue to use Falanx for further phishing campaigns to prove the effectiveness of our cyber security training”

Tony Donn
Head of IT, Cenkos

“Falanx conducted in-person training session that made employees engage, participate, and ask questions. Rob the trainer showed us that human recognition is one of the most important lines of defence against phishing and cyber security attacks. We especially enjoyed Rob’s stories of social engineering and made all employees sit up and think how important all aspects of cyber security not just attacks via conventional means.”

Tony Donn
Head of IT, Cenkos

“We see great value in investing in positive reinforcement of staff, especially in delivering awareness training. Due to COVID-19 on site training was not possible but Falanx were able to step in and provide their usual high quality cyber security training over web.”

Cyber Security Manager
Leading Specialist Bank
[/vc_column][/vc_row]
